message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV. 

The paper proposes a novel method of regularization for recurrent neural networks, which is a common topic in the natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning (ML) communities. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) are the most likely categories. Additionally, the method involves adaptive and input-driven regularization on a per-neuron basis, which is related to the fields of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and neural networks (cs.NE). Finally, the paper demonstrates its effectiveness on a language dataset, which could also be relevant to computer vision (cs.CV) research.
